resources.string:
INSTRUCTIONS: 
1.Click on the 'START'button to begin the test. 
2.Each question consists of 4 answer choices.Select the correct answer. 
3.Your score is displayed on the top left corner of the screen. 
4.To finish the test before attempting all the question click on the'X' button on the to right corner of the screen. 
5.After finishing all the questions you'll be directed to the result page 
6.The result page displays number of correct answers,number of wrong answers and your total test 
7.Click on the 'RETEST'button on the result page to retake the test or return to the starting page 
ALL THE BEST
